700832f-a.text:
Cruger Ave., adjoining the N.E. corner of Lydig Ave., showing the hhorth side and rear of a new apartment house occupying that site. Cruger Ave. is at the extreme left, between the new house and the one
under construction.
Julv 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
700832f-a.folder: Cruger Avenue & Lydig Avenue, Bronx, NY
